ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of RUTH M. GOLDBLOOM of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21 to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
